bioAsHtml: I'm a self-taught software engineer who started as a freelancer in web development and webdesign. I also worked as lead engineer in core team @Etsy / Alittlemarket.com to end-up at @Fluo, a growing insurtech startup. I’m passionate about development methodologies and creative problem solving.

acceptedTalks.title: Blameless postmortems : comment apprendre de ses erreurs

bio: I'm a self-taught software engineer who started as a freelancer in web development and webdesign. I also worked as lead engineer in core team @Etsy / Alittlemarket.com to end-up at @Fluo, a growing insurtech startup. I’m passionate about development methodologies and creative problem solving.
